3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Miqdam bin Shuraih, from his father, that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would put his mouth on the place from which I had drunk, and he would drink from my leftovers when I was menstruating

chapter.ara-name: باب مُؤَاكَلَةِ الْحَائِضِ وَالشُّرْبِ مِنْ سُؤْرِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Eating With A Menstruating Woman And What Is Leftover After Her
